thread.section_title: Technology - Internet Related Businesses For Sale in the US
thread.title: ECommerce Business - Health & Beauty Sector

title: ECommerce Business - Health & Beauty Sector
text: Questions Business Summary A niche player in the Health & Beauty Sector, this eCommerce company has decided to go to market after nearly two decades in business.The company has a great reputation in the industry and a large following on social media. With growth continuing year over year and endless scale opportunities, this business represents a unique opportunity in the eCommerce space and a great acquisition for a portfolio entrepreneur or an equity group looking for an excellent investment in a high growth business and sector. Like many eCommerce companies of this age and size, sales are generated from a number of channels, all of which can be scaled in multiple directions. Current shareholders will provide in depth scale strategies to the buying entity - these strategies haven't been implement solely due to a lack of bandwidth due to consistent and constant organic growth in recent years. The business has a number of amazing features that could never be totally covered in this short listing, but a few of the features making it stand out from the crowd include: an 18% YOY Growth Rate, 26% Recurring Revenue, over $2M in earnings, tremendous scale opportunities, proprietary, branded product lines, and accounts in closed sectors on online marketplaces. Financials
